mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sit.sit_id AS id, sit.sit_name AS name, sit.sit_address AS address, sit.sit_phone_number AS phoneNumber FROM t_site sit JOIN t_match mat ON sit.sit_id = mat.mat_site_fk JOIN t_joueur_match jma ON mat.mat_id = jma.jma_match_fk WHERE jma.jma_joueur_fk = #{player.id} UNION SELECT DISTINCT sit.sit_id AS id, sit.sit_name AS name, sit.sit_address AS address, sit.sit_phone_number AS phoneNumber FROM t_site sit WHERE sit.sit_creator_id = #{player.id}
SELECT sit.sit_id AS id, sit.sit_name AS name, sit.sit_address AS address, sit.sit_phone_number AS phoneNumber FROM t_site sit WHERE sit.sit_id = #{id}
